title: Rebalance a Portfolio to Target Allocation
description: A client's portfolio has drifted from its target asset allocation (60% stocks, 40% bonds) and needs to be rebalanced.

tasks.description: Analyze the client's current portfolio holdings and identify the deviation from the target allocation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the current allocation is 70% stocks / 30% bonds.

tasks.description: Generate a list of recommended trades (sell stocks, buy bonds) to return to the target allocation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a trade list to sell specific stocks and buy specific bonds.

tasks.description: Present the rebalancing plan to the client for approval before execution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the rationale for the trades and seeks client consent.
